abstract.p: Nicholas Wolfson letter, responding to May 28 Week in Review article, deplores revisionist 'post-Zionism' philosophy in Israel (M)

block.p: As a May 28 Week in Review article points out, Israel is rethinking its history. The new ''post-Zionism'' asserts that Israel is at best morally equivalent to its Arab antagonists. Indeed, the liberal establishment is teaching Israeli youth that the country's founders were colonialists who subjugated the Arabs and drove them from their homeland. Post-Zionists want to eliminate the Jewish character of the state and create a ''modern,'' secular, multicultural society.
